featured.text: Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.
Which of the following is true about Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers? (A)

definition.zh_def: 歌手，指以唱歌為職業或愛好的人。
definition.en_def: Individuals who perform songs, often professionally.
definition.example: The singers at the concert captivated the audience with their powerful voices.
